title: As Torture Report's Release Nears, CIA And Opponents Ready Responses
teaser: The Senate's release will focus on case studies of the treatment, at times brutal, of 20 or so high-value detainees in the counterterrorism efforts following 9/11, and whether those methods paid off.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
